Application.Controller

Class MatchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.MatchController

  • @SessionAttributes(value={"scenarioId","goToInDepth"})
 @Controller
public class MatchController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing the Quick Match(es). A User can play a Match from the Feed page or the first time they play within a Scenario.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getMatch

        @RequestMapping(value="/match",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String getMatch(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                    @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="scenarioId",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                    int scenarioId,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="goToInDepth",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                    boolean goToInDepth,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="vision",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                    int selectedVisionId,
                                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Returns the page with the Quick Match ready to be played by the User.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        scenarioId - The unique identifier of the Scenario.
        goToInDepth - Whether the User decided to play the In-depth version of the Match.
        selectedVisionId - The unique identifier of the chosen Vision.
        req - Instance of HttpServletRequest class.
        Returns:
        "match" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • changePage

        @RequestMapping(value="/changePage",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String changePage(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                    @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                    @ModelAttribute(value="button-pressed")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String buttonPressed,
                                                                                                    @ModelAttribute(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                    int scenarioId,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="goToInDepth",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                    boolean goToInDepth,
                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="feelingsAvailability")
                                                                                                    boolean feelingsAvailability)
        Navigate the User to the correct page depending on the button pressed.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        buttonPressed - The button pressed by the User to identify which page they should be redirected to.
        scenarioId - The unique identifier of the Scenario.
        goToInDepth - Whether the User want to play the In-depth version of the Match.
        feelingsAvailability - Whether the User should express their Feeling.
        Returns:
        A string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client. Possible return strings:
        • "redirect:/feelings"
        • "redirect:/error"
        • "redirect:/match"
        • "redirect:/in-depth"

      • saveMatchGuesses

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/saveGuesses",
                method=POST)
public void saveMatchGuesses(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                               @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                               java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                               @ModelAttribute(value="new_match")
                                                                                                               Match newMatch)
        Saves the guesses of the Match played by the User.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        newMatch - The instance of Match being played.

      • getUpdatedPosition

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/updated-position",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getUpdatedPosition(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                 @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="points")
                                                                                                                                 int points)
        Compute and returns the updated position and score of the User when a Match is played.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        points - The scores achieved by the User in the current Match.
        Returns:
        The information about the updates of the Leaderboard.
